title: Actions
disclaimer: Changes you make to your report are saved automatically to your browser's local storage, hence your information is completely secure.

importExport.heading: Import/Export
importExport.body: You can import or export your data in JSON format. With this, you can edit and print your resume from any device. Save this file for later use.

emailReport.heading: Send To Pastor
emailReport.body: After clicking this link, ensure you copy the necessary persons manually.

downloadPDF.heading: Download PDF
downloadPDF.body: Click on the button below to save a copy of your report.

reset.heading: Reset Report!
reset.body: Be careful, resetting will remove all the information that you have entered. Click on the button below if you're absolutely sure.
